name: BooleanRing.isIdempotentElem
initialProofState:
α : Type u_4
self : BooleanRing α
a : α
⊢ IsIdempotentElem a
decl:
/-- A Boolean ring is a ring where multiplication is idempotent. -/
class BooleanRing (α) extends Ring α where
  /-- Multiplication in a boolean ring is idempotent. -/
  isIdempotentElem (a : α) : IsIdempotentElem a

name: BooleanRing.mul_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a : α
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul a a) a
decl:
@[scoped simp]
lemma mul_self : a * a = a := IsIdempotentElem.eq (isIdempotentElem a)

name: BooleanRing.instIdempotentOpHMul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
⊢ Std.IdempotentOp fun x1 x2 => HMul.hMul x1 x2
decl:
instance : Std.IdempotentOp (α := α) (· * ·) :=
  ⟨BooleanRing.mul_self⟩

name: BooleanRing.add_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a : α
⊢ Eq (HAdd.hAdd a a) 0
decl:
@[scoped simp]
theorem add_self : a + a = 0 := by
  have : a + a = a + a + (a + a) :=
    calc
      a + a = (a + a) * (a + a) := by rw [mul_self]
      _ = a * a + a * a + (a * a + a * a) := by rw [add_mul, mul_add]
      _ = a + a + (a + a) := by rw [mul_self]
  rwa [self_eq_add_left] at this

name: BooleanRing.neg_eq
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a : α
⊢ Eq (Neg.neg a) a
decl:
@[scoped simp]
theorem neg_eq : -a = a :=
  calc
    -a = -a + 0 := by rw [add_zero]
    _ = -a + -a + a := by rw [← neg_add_cancel, add_assoc]
    _ = a := by rw [add_self, zero_add]

name: BooleanRing.add_eq_zero'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : α
⊢ Iff (Eq (HAdd.hAdd a b) 0) (Eq a b)
decl:
theorem add_eq_zero' : a + b = 0 ↔ a = b :=
  calc
    a + b = 0 ↔ a = -b := add_eq_zero_iff_eq_neg
    _ ↔ a = b := by rw [neg_eq]

name: BooleanRing.mul_add_mul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (HAdd.hAdd (HMul.hMul a b) (HMul.hMul b a)) 0
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mul_add_mul : a * b + b * a = 0 := by
  have : a + b = a + b + (a * b + b * a) :=
    calc
      a + b = (a + b) * (a + b) := by rw [mul_self]
      _ = a * a + a * b + (b * a + b * b) := by rw [add_mul, mul_add, mul_add]
      _ = a + a * b + (b * a + b) := by simp only [mul_self]
      _ = a + b + (a * b + b * a) := by abel
  rwa [self_eq_add_right] at this

name: BooleanRing.sub_eq_add
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (HSub.hSub a b) (HAdd.hAdd a b)
decl:
@[scoped simp]
theorem sub_eq_add : a - b = a + b := by rw [sub_eq_add_neg, add_right_inj, neg_eq]

name: BooleanRing.mul_one_add_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a : α
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul a (HAdd.hAdd 1 a)) 0
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mul_one_add_self : a * (1 + a) = 0 := by rw [mul_add, mul_one, mul_self, add_self]

name: BooleanRing.sup_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (Max.max a b) (Max.max b a)
decl:
theorem sup_comm (a b : α) : a ⊔ b = b ⊔ a := by
  dsimp only [(· ⊔ ·)]
  ring

name: BooleanRing.inf_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (Min.min a b) (Min.min b a)
decl:
theorem inf_comm (a b : α) : a ⊓ b = b ⊓ a := by
  dsimp only [(· ⊓ ·)]
  ring

name: BooleanRing.sup_assoc
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b c : α
⊢ Eq (Max.max (Max.max a b) c) (Max.max a (Max.max b c))
decl:
theorem sup_assoc (a b c : α) : a ⊔ b ⊔ c = a ⊔ (b ⊔ c) := by
  dsimp only [(· ⊔ ·)]
  ring

name: BooleanRing.inf_assoc
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b c : α
⊢ Eq (Min.min (Min.min a b) c) (Min.min a (Min.min b c))
decl:
theorem inf_assoc (a b c : α) : a ⊓ b ⊓ c = a ⊓ (b ⊓ c) := by
  dsimp only [(· ⊓ ·)]
  ring

name: BooleanRing.sup_inf_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (Max.max a (Min.min a b)) a
decl:
theorem sup_inf_self (a b : α) : a ⊔ a ⊓ b = a := by
  dsimp only [(· ⊔ ·), (· ⊓ ·)]
  rw [← mul_assoc, mul_self, add_assoc, add_self, add_zero]

name: BooleanRing.inf_sup_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : α
⊢ Eq (Min.min a (Max.max a b)) a
decl:
theorem inf_sup_self (a b : α) : a ⊓ (a ⊔ b) = a := by
  dsimp only [(· ⊔ ·), (· ⊓ ·)]
  rw [mul_add, mul_add, mul_self, ← mul_assoc, mul_self, add_assoc, add_self, add_zero]

name: BooleanRing.le_sup_inf_aux
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b c : α
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd a b) (HMul.hMul a b)) (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd a c) (HMul.hMul a c))) (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd a (HMul.hMul b c)) (HMul.hMul a (HMul.hMul b c)))
decl:
theorem le_sup_inf_aux (a b c : α) : (a + b + a * b) * (a + c + a * c) = a + b * c + a * (b * c) :=
  calc
    (a + b + a * b) * (a + c + a * c) =
        a * a + b * c + a * (b * c) + (a * b + a * a * b) + (a * c + a * a * c) +
          (a * b * c + a * a * b * c) := by ring
    _ = a + b * c + a * (b * c) := by simp only [mul_self, add_self, add_zero]

name: BooleanRing.le_sup_inf
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b c : α
⊢ Eq (Max.max (Min.min (Max.max a b) (Max.max a c)) (Max.max a (Min.min b c))) (Max.max a (Min.min b c))
decl:
theorem le_sup_inf (a b c : α) : (a ⊔ b) ⊓ (a ⊔ c) ⊔ (a ⊔ b ⊓ c) = a ⊔ b ⊓ c := by
  dsimp only [(· ⊔ ·), (· ⊓ ·)]
  rw [le_sup_inf_aux, add_self, mul_self, zero_add]

name: ofBoolAlg_sup
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : AsBoolAlg α
⊢ Eq (ofBoolAlg (Max.max a b)) (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd (ofBoolAlg a) (ofBoolAlg b)) (HMul.hMul (ofBoolAlg a) (ofBoolAlg b)))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofBoolAlg_sup (a b : AsBoolAlg α) :
    ofBoolAlg (a ⊔ b) = ofBoolAlg a + ofBoolAlg b + ofBoolAlg a * ofBoolAlg b :=
  rfl

inst✝ : BooleanRing α

decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofBoolAlg_inf (a b : AsBoolAlg α) : ofBoolAlg (a ⊓ b) = ofBoolAlg a * ofBoolAlg b :=

decl:

initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : AsBoolAlg α
⊢ Eq (ofBoolAlg (SDiff.sdiff a b)) (HMul.hMul (ofBoolAlg a) (HAdd.hAdd 1 (ofBoolAlg b)))
decl:

name: ofBoolAlg_symmDiff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : BooleanRing α
a b : AsBoolAlg α
⊢ Eq (ofBoolAlg (symmDiff a b)) (HAdd.hAdd (ofBoolAlg a) (ofBoolAlg b))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofBoolAlg_symmDiff (a b : AsBoolAlg α) : ofBoolAlg (a ∆ b) = ofBoolAlg a + ofBoolAlg b := by
  rw [symmDiff_eq_sup_sdiff_inf]
  exact of_boolalg_symmDiff_aux _ _

decl:

name: RingHom.asBoolAlg_toLatticeHom_toSupHom_toFun
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : BooleanRing α
inst✝ : BooleanRing β
f : RingHom α β
a✝ : AsBoolAlg α
⊢ Eq (f.asBoolAlg.toSupHom a✝) (Function.comp (⇑toBoolAlg) (Function.comp ⇑f ⇑ofBoolAlg) a✝)
decl:
/-- Turn a ring homomorphism from Boolean rings `α` to `β` into a bounded lattice homomorphism
from `α` to `β` considered as Boolean algebras. -/
@[simps]
protected def RingHom.asBoolAlg (f : α →+* β) : BoundedLatticeHom (AsBoolAlg α) (AsBoolAlg β) where
  toFun := toBoolAlg ∘ f ∘ ofBoolAlg
  map_sup' a b := by
    dsimp
    simp_rw [map_add f, map_mul f, toBoolAlg_add_add_mul]
  map_inf' := f.map_mul'
  map_top' := f.map_one'
  map_bot' := f.map_zero'

decl:
@[simp]
theorem RingHom.asBoolAlg_id : (RingHom.id α).asBoolAlg = BoundedLatticeHom.id _ :=
  rfl

decl:

theorem RingHom.asBoolAlg_comp (g : β →+* γ) (f : α →+* β) :
    (g.comp f).asBoolAlg = g.asBoolAlg.comp f.asBoolAlg :=
  rfl

name: BoundedLatticeHom.asBoolRing_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : BooleanAlgebra α
inst✝ : BooleanAlgebra β
f : BoundedLatticeHom α β
a✝ : AsBoolRing α
⊢ Eq (f.asBoolRing a✝) (Function.comp (⇑toBoolRing) (Function.comp ⇑f ⇑ofBoolRing) a✝)
decl:
/-- Turn a bounded lattice homomorphism from Boolean algebras `α` to `β` into a ring homomorphism
from `α` to `β` considered as Boolean rings. -/
@[simps]
protected def BoundedLatticeHom.asBoolRing (f : BoundedLatticeHom α β) :
    AsBoolRing α →+* AsBoolRing β where
  toFun := toBoolRing ∘ f ∘ ofBoolRing
  map_zero' := f.map_bot'
  map_one' := f.map_top'
  map_add' := map_symmDiff' f
  map_mul' := f.map_inf'

  rfl

initialProofState:
α : Type u_4

a✝ : α
⊢ Eq ((RelIso.symm (OrderIso.asBoolAlgAsBoolRing α)) a✝) (toBoolAlg (toBoolRing a✝))
decl:
/-- Order isomorphism between `α` considered as a Boolean ring considered as a Boolean algebra and
`α`. -/
@[simps!]
def OrderIso.asBoolAlgAsBoolRing (α : Type*) [BooleanAlgebra α] : AsBoolAlg (AsBoolRing α) ≃o α :=
  ⟨ofBoolAlg.trans ofBoolRing,
   ofBoolRing_le_ofBoolRing_iff.trans ofBoolAlg_mul_ofBoolAlg_eq_left_iff⟩
